[File: aptos-core/types/src/account_address.rs] [Function: create_derived_object_address()] [Hash collision resistance] Does the SHA3-256 hash at line 172 provide sufficient collision resistance for the expected number of derived objects, or can birthday attacks find collisions within feasible time/cost? [File: aptos-core/types/src/account_address.rs] [Function: create_derived_object_address()] [Circular derivation attack] Can an attacker create circular object derivation chains where object A derives object B which derives object A, causing infinite loops or stack overflows in ownership verification?
